meanings.definition: Happening at an inconvenient or inappropriate time.
meanings.sent1: The rain during the picnic was inopportune.
meanings.sent2: Her inopportune arrival interrupted the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The inopportune alarm clock made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The inopportune thunderstorm mirrored his bad luck.
meanings.sent5: The inopportune bus delay caused chaos at the station.

meanings.sent1: His inopportune joke offended the audience.
meanings.sent2: The inopportune decision led to a disaster.
meanings.sent3: The inopportune gift was accidentally dropped.
meanings.sent4: The inopportune comment left an awkward silence.
meanings.sent5: The inopportune timing of the announcement shocked everyone.

meanings.sent1: Wearing a winter coat in summer is inopportune.
meanings.sent2: The inopportune location of the store affected sales.
meanings.sent3: The inopportune choice of music made people dance.
meanings.sent4: The inopportune seating arrangement caused confusion.
meanings.sent5: The inopportune traffic jam delayed their plans.
